product_overview: Mientior is a premium enterprise-grade e-commerce marketplace platform built on Next.js 15 with Prisma ORM and a Refine admin panel. It supports rich frontend features like product catalog, search, cart, checkout, user accounts alongside a comprehensive admin dashboard for managing products, categories, orders, users, and marketing campaigns. The platform integrates Stripe for payments, Redis for caching and sessions, and Better Auth for authentication, aiming to provide a scalable, performant, and secure shopping experience with a modern UI.
core_goals: Provide a modern, user-friendly e-commerce storefront with seamless browsing, search, and purchase flows.
Enable efficient, role-based admin management of products, orders, users, categories, vendors, and marketing campaigns.
Ensure secure and reliable user authentication and session management with Better Auth and Redis caching.
Integrate smooth, secure payment processing with Stripe including order creation and webhook handling.
Offer a scalable backend API layer built on Prisma ORM for robust data operations on a single PostgreSQL database.
Implement advanced features like wishlist, product reviews with verification, promo codes, multi-vendor support, and loyalty programs.
Deliver a responsive UI/UX with accessibility, performance optimizations, and global search capabilities.
Support real-time notifications and analytics to empower business insights and user engagement.
key_features: Responsive homepage with hero carousel, category navigation, flash deals, trending and curated products, testimonials, and newsletter subscription.
Comprehensive product catalog with filters, sorting, search, pagination, and rich product detail views featuring galleries, variants, reviews, and recommendations.
Complete cart and multi-step checkout flow with shipping, payment selection, and order summaries integrated with Stripe payments.
User account dashboard including order history, profile management, addresses, and wishlist functionality.
Global search with autocomplete supporting products, categories, and multi-tab result views.

Fully featured admin panel built with Refine and Ant Design providing CRUD operations for products, categories, orders, users, vendors, campaigns, promo codes, and segments with role-based access control and audit logging.
REST API endpoints consistent with Refine requirements for all resources supporting pagination, filtering, and sorting.
State management using Zustand for client state (cart, wishlist) and React Query for server state with caching.
Stripe integration handling payment sessions, webhook processing, and secure order management.
Robust authentication system using Better Auth with email/password and Google OAuth.
Advanced marketing and loyalty modules including email/SMS campaigns, promo codes, and customer segmentation.
Support for dynamic content management and on-demand ISR cache revalidation to keep the storefront up to date.
user_flow_summary: Users land on the homepage and explore featured products, categories, and promotions.
Users browse the product catalog applying filters and search queries, select products to view detailed information.
Authenticated users can add products to their cart, update quantities, and proceed to checkout.
During checkout, users enter shipping information, select shipping options, provide payment details via Stripe, and confirm orders.
Authenticated users can access their account dashboard to review order history, manage profiles and addresses, and modify their wishlist.
Admin users log in through the Refine admin panel to manage products, categories, orders, users, vendors, campaigns, and promotions according to their role permissions.
Admins perform CRUD operations and use advanced filtering, sorting, and bulk actions to efficiently manage data.
The system processes payments via Stripe and listens to webhook events to update orders and notify users.
All users benefit from global search capabilities with autocomplete and results segmented by type.
Real-time notifications and analytics dashboards provide insights and alerts to admins for ongoing store management.
validation_criteria: All core user flows (browse catalog, add to cart, checkout, user registration/login) complete without errors in testing environments.
Admin CRUD operations for products, categories, orders, users, and marketing resources function correctly with role-based permission enforcement.
Stripe payment flow processes successfully including checkout session creation, payment confirmation via webhooks, and resulting order creation/update.
Security tested with enforced authentication and authorization on protected routes and API endpoints.
Search returns relevant results quickly with autocomplete and supports multi-tab filtering for product and category types.
Client and server state management maintain data consistency with cart and wishlist persistence across sessions.
Cache invalidation and ISR revalidation mechanisms operate as expected after data changes.
Responsive UI elements render correctly across devices and meet accessibility standards (WCAG AA).
Email system sends test emails and notification flows work correctly for user actions and admin alerts.
Performance benchmarks met including optimized image loading, API response times, and minimal UI lag.
Audit logging captures all significant admin actions for compliance and traceability.
Real-time notifications deliver timely updates within the admin interface.
